title: Codifying the universal language of honey bees

title_detail.value: Codifying the universal language of honey bees

summary: In a paper appearing in April's issue of Animal Behaviour researchers decipher the instructive messages encoded in the insects' movements, called waggle dances.

summary_detail.value: In a paper appearing in April's issue of Animal Behaviour researchers decipher the instructive messages encoded in the insects' movements, called waggle dances.
